data.title: Innjoy Telcom Website
data.description: A modern platform built for a telecommunications company to showcase their services and enable user registration. The frontend is developed with React and Tailwind CSS, while the backend leverages Express and MongoDB for robust data management and API functionality.

data.title: Pizz Treat Ecommerce Website
data.description: A modern platform built for a Peanut brand to show their brand product they sell. The frontend is developed with React and Tailwind CSS.

data.title: Cleaning Service Website
data.description: A responsive website for a cleaning service company, built with React and Tailwind CSS. The site highlights available services, showcases the brand, and provides an easy way for customers to learn more and get in touch.

data.title: TechCare Clinic Website
data.description: A responsive website for a cleaning service company, built with React and Tailwind CSS. The site highlights available services, showcases the brand, and provides an easy way for customers to learn more and get in touch.

data.title: A meme app
data.description: A modern web application that allows users to generate and share memes. Built with React, this app features a user-friendly interface for creating memes from images and text, and includes functionality for saving and sharing memes across social media platforms.

data.title: Loopstudios landing page
data.description: This beautiful responsive landing page was layed out using CSS grid layout.

data.title: Sunnyside agency landing page
data.description: A beautiful responsive landing page built with vanilla CSS and JS.

data.title: Bookmark landing page
data.description: A nice responsive layout-based project with tabbed features section and the FAQ accordion.

data.title: Clipboard landing page
data.description: A nice layout-based project with multi-column and responsive layouts.

data.title: Custom WhatsApp Link
data.description: Custom whatsapp link maker for sharing.

data.title: FUTA Homepage: Redesign
data.description: A redesign of The Federal University of Technology, Akure website using plain HTML, CSS, and javascript.

data.title: Interactive card details form
data.description: In this project i was able to put my javaScript skill to test by implementing some DOM manipulations and form validation in this Interactive card details form.

data.title: Intro section with dropdown navigation
data.description: Here i created a responsive landing page whilst incorporating a dropdown navigation menu.

data.title: News homepage
data.description: With the use of CSS Grid i was able to create this news Homepage with multiple sections.

data.title: Notifications page
data.description: This projects is a simple notification page built with vanilla HTML, CSS and JS, with the functionality to toggle the visual state of the notifications.

data.title: NFT preview card component
data.description: A simple preview card component built with vanilla HTML and CSS.

data.title: E-commerce product page
data.description: Here i built a beautiful responsive product page with a lightbox product gallery and cart functionality.

data.title: Time tracking dashboard
data.description: Aside creating this wonderful dashboard with CSS grid i also work with a JSON data file to practice working with data.

data.title: Order summary component
data.description: A simple order summary landing page built with vanilla CSS.

data.title: Calculator app

data.description: A responsive preview card component.

data.title: URL shortening API landing page
data.description: In this project i Integrated with the Clean URI link shortening API to shorten long urls and also made use of the browser storage.
